mapper.sql: SELECT ad_day_result.id,ad_day_result.org_code,ad_day_result.org_name,ad_day_result.employee,ad_day_result.real_name,ad_day_result.ad_date,ad_day_result.shift_name,ad_day_result.state,ad_day_result.state_name,ad_day_result.times,ad_day_result.minutes,ad_day_result.work_minutes,ad_day_result.shift_id,ad_day_result.employee_no,ad_employee.is_attendance AS is_attendance,employee_no_sys_user.real_name AS employee_no_ad_employee_real_name FROM ad_day_result INNER JOIN ad_employee ON ad_day_result.employee_no = ad_employee.employee_no LEFT JOIN sys_user employee_no_sys_user ON ad_employee.id = employee_no_sys_user.id
